author: jonl
msg: Moved call to session factory to Session.get(), removed session setting on PageMaps, moved session factory to Application and removed getDefaultSessionFactory.

author: crossley
msg: Plugins "dist" target needed to depend on "jar" and include the built jar into the plugin's lib directory inside the zip archive.
Thanks to Brian Dube for discovering that plugins were missing plugin jars.

author: niallp
msg: Add LICENSE and NOTICE files to all modules in maven's default resources location

author: fhanik
msg: Since we can keep alive a HTTP connection, even after we have stopped using it as a comet, then we need to go back to the original timeout

author: almaw
msg: Fix failing build caused by lack of tests classifier export.
